summary: Resolve productization P0/P1 gaps for container parity, setup copy safety, hook consistency, and Bun preflight override behavior.
notes: Fixes include preserving .env.example in Docker context, proper Docker env flag usage, moving config-directory copy after target creation, bun-only pre-push governance call, generated pre-push hook support, Bun override-aware preflight behavior, and ignore rules for env example and Windows nul artifact.
